definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: warp (NH id.; Ar. satany, sadany id.);—always ´[[שׁ]]: abs.;—warp, the set of threads drawn lengthwise in loom, through which the shuttle bearing the woof (II. [[עֵרֶב]] p. 786) is thrown crosswise; Le 13:48 + 7 t. Le 13; cf. GFM:PAOS, Oct. 1889, cixxviii ARSK:EB WEAVING.
